Pre-Game Insights: The Mets are playing in the NL Wild Card Game 3 against the Milwaukee Brewers.
The game is scheduled for 7:08 PM EDT.
The game will be broadcast on ESPN.
The Mets' lineup includes Francisco Lindor, Mark Vientos, Brandon Nimmo, Pete Alonso, José Iglesias, Jesse Winker, Starling Marte, Tyrone Taylor, Francisco Alvarez, and José Quintana.
The Brewers' lineup includes Jackson Chourio, Blake Perkins, William Contreras, Willy Adames, Gary Sanchez, Rhys Hoskins, Sal Frelick, Joey Ortiz, Brice Turang, and Tobias Myers.
